post:
Sugoi Dot US has been running for 7-8 months and this is the first offer I've ever given publicly, so bare with me. In the past I only provided services privately. I.E to people who expressly asked.
 
All plans are semi-managed. Meaning (to a certain degree) you'll get assistance with anything you need.
You won't be tossed aside once you're handed your service, if you need help you'll receive it.

Getting to the meaty part...
 
The following plans can be found here. https://sugoi.us/panel/cart.php
Using the code vpsboard will give you a recurring 10% off all our plans.
